languages.text: "Допрос пленных показал, что в Комморре произошла политическая катастрофа среднего масштаба. Кабал Опустошительной бури утратил авторитет и стал целью для врагов и конкурентов. Многие вассалы и члены данного клана решили не дожидаться, пока их добьют, и бежали в пространство реальности".

"Prisoner interrogations indicate that a relatively major political upheaval has taken place in Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest has lost its grip on authority and become a target for enemies and rivals. Many vassals and members of the Kabal decided that fleeing to realspace was preferable to waiting in Commorragh to be killed."
languages.original_text: "Допрос пленных показал, что в Комморре произошла политическая катастрофа среднего масштаба. Кабал Опустошительной бури утратил авторитет и стал целью для врагов и конкурентов. Многие вассалы и члены данного клана решили не дожидаться, пока их добьют, и бежали в пространство реальности".

languages.text: “我们审讯了一部分囚犯。他们的供词表明，科摩罗发生了一场巨大的政治动荡。狂风阴谋团已经失去了对权力的掌控，沦为众多敌人与对手的猎物。阴谋团许多领主与成员并不打算留在科摩罗等死，而是打算逃往真实世界。”
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that a relatively major political upheaval has taken place in Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest has lost its grip on authority and become a target for enemies and rivals. Many vassals and members of the Kabal decided that fleeing to realspace was preferable to waiting in Commorragh to be killed."

traits.locale_text: “我们审讯了一部分囚犯。他们的供词表明，科摩罗发生了一场巨大的政治动荡。狂风阴谋团已经失去了对全力的掌控，沦为众多敌人与对手的猎物。阴谋团许多领主与成员并不打算留在科摩罗等死，而是打算逃往真实世界。”

languages.text: «Al interrogar prisioneros, hemos descubierto que se ha producido un vuelco político considerable en Commorragh. La Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora ha perdido su autoridad, pasando a ser objetivo de sus enemigos y rivales. Muchos vasallos e integrantes de la Kábala han considerado que huir al espacio real era preferible a esperar la muerte en la Ciudad Siniestra».
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that a relatively major political upheaval has taken place in Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest has lost its grip on authority and become a target for enemies and rivals. Many vassals and members of the Kabal decided that fleeing to realspace was preferable to waiting in Commorragh to be killed."

traits.locale_text: «Al interrogar prisioneros, hemos descubierto que se ha producido un vuelco político considerable en Commorragh. La Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora ha perdido su autoridad, pasando a ser objetivo de sus enemigos y rivales. Muchos vasallos e integrantes de la Kábala han considerado que huir al espacio real era preferible a esperar la muerte en la Ciudad Siniestra».

languages.text: 「捕虜を尋問したところ、比較的大きな政治的混乱がコモラフで起きているらしい。陰謀団『略奪の嵐』が権力を失い、敵対勢力や競合に狙われるようになっている。陰謀団の器と団員の多くが、コモラフで殺されるのを待つよりもリアルスペースへ逃げ込む方がいいと判断したというわけだ」
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that a relatively major political upheaval has taken place in Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest has lost its grip on authority and become a target for enemies and rivals. Many vassals and members of the Kabal decided that fleeing to realspace was preferable to waiting in Commorragh to be killed."

traits.locale_text: 「捕虜を尋問したところ、比較的大きな政治的混乱がコモラフで起きているらしい。陰謀団『略奪の嵐』が権力を失い、敵対勢力や競合に狙われるようになっている。陰謀団の器と団員の多くが、コモラフで殺されるのを待つよりもリアルスペースへ逃げ込む方がいいと判断したというわけだ」

languages.text: « À en croire les interrogatoires de prisonniers, un bouleversement politique relativement important est survenu à Commorragh. La Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse a perdu son autorité, ce qui en fait une cible pour ses ennemis et ses rivaux. La plupart de ses vassaux et de ses membres ont décidé qu'il valait mieux se réfugier dans l'espace réel, plutôt que d'attendre d'être tués à Commorragh. »
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that a relatively major political upheaval has taken place in Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest has lost its grip on authority and become a target for enemies and rivals. Many vassals and members of the Kabal decided that fleeing to realspace was preferable to waiting in Commorragh to be killed."

traits.locale_text: « À en croire les interrogatoires de prisonniers, un bouleversement politique relativement important est survenu à Commorragh. La Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse a perdu son autorité, ce qui en fait une cible pour ses ennemis et ses rivaux. La plupart de ses vassaux et de ses membres ont décidé qu'il valait mieux se réfugier dans l'espace réel, plutôt que d'attendre d'être tués à Commorragh. »

languages.text: "Verhöre von Gefangenen deuten auf einen relativ großen politischen Umsturz in Commorragh hin. Die Kabale des plündernden Sturms hat ihre Autorität eingebüßt und ist zum Ziel von Feinden und Rivalen geworden. Viele Vasallen und Mitglieder der Kabale waren der Ansicht, eine Flucht in den Realraum sei besser, als in Commorragh auf den eigenen Tod zu warten."
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that a relatively major political upheaval has taken place in Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest has lost its grip on authority and become a target for enemies and rivals. Many vassals and members of the Kabal decided that fleeing to realspace was preferable to waiting in Commorragh to be killed."

languages.text: "Tutsakların dediğine göre Commorragh'ta nispeten büyük bir siyasi çalkantı yaşanmış. Velayetini kaybeden Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı, düşmanları ve rakipleri için hedef hâline gelmiş. Kabal'ın tebaa ve azalarından çoğu gerçekuzaya kaçmayı, Commorragh'ta ölümü beklemeye yeğlemiş."
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that a relatively major political upheaval has taken place in Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest has lost its grip on authority and become a target for enemies and rivals. Many vassals and members of the Kabal decided that fleeing to realspace was preferable to waiting in Commorragh to be killed."
